form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: PETITION TO CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE FOR ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA, FORM I-130

full_text: U.S. Department of Justice Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 GAB No. 1115-0054 Immigration and Naturalization Service. Approval expires 4-86 PETITION TO CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE Fee Stamp FOR ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA I-130 130 35.00 (PLEASE NOTE - YOU ARE THE PETITIONER AND EMPL 22 03/28/86 YOUR RELATIVE IS THE BENEFICIARY) 1000222280204 4:48 TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE: The petition was filed on 3/18/86 REMARKS The petition is approved for status under PERSONAL INTERVIEW CONDUCTED section: U.S. APPROVED INS. DOCUMENT CHECK ONLY WESTERN ADI. CENTER FIELD INVESTIGATION COMPLETED SPOUSE, DATE 201 (b) CHILD 203 (a) (2) OF APPROVAL PREVIOUSLY FORWARDED ACTION JUL 2 1986 201 (b) PARENT 203 (a) (4) Les DD J.W. Wating 203 (a) (1) 203 (a) (5) DISTRICT WAC (PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) 1. Name of beneficiary (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2. Do Not Write In This Space 3. Beneficiary's marital status: JARUGITPITAYAKUL, CHAREON Married Widowed Divorced Single 4. Other names used by beneficiary (including maiden name if married) 5. Has this beneficiary ever been in the U.S.? Jarlean Jarugitpitayakul YES NO 6. Country of beneficiary's birth 7. Date of beneficiary's birth (Month, day, year) 8. Are beneficiary and petitioner related by adoption? Thailand January 2, 1913 YES NO 9. Petitioner's name is (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 10. petitioner's phone No. 11. The beneficiary is my: (relationship) SULLIVAN BENJAMA 441-0903 Father 10 12. Other names used by petitioner (including maiden name if married woman) Benjama Jalukitpitayakul 13. Name of beneficiary's spouse, if married, and date and country of birth (Omit this item if petition is for you spouse) Bun Lerh 10-10-13 Thailand 14. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, if any (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) 430 S. Orange Grove 3 JUL 1985 S. Pasadena, California CONSULAR SECT. 91030 BANGKOK 15. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of beneficiary's children: THAILAND Bunnot Tarmgitnitavakul - 5-16-46-Thailan Benjama Sullivan-6-19-48-Thailand FOIA (b)(6) Chaiyarit Jarigitpitayakul-Thailang 16. Check the appropriate box below and furnish the information required for the box checked: Beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in Bangkok Thailand (CITY IN FOREIGN COUNTRY) (FOREIGN COUNTRY) Beneficiary is in the United States and will apply for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident in the office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service at (CITY) (STATE) If the application for adjustment of status is denied, the beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in (CITY IN FOREIGN COUNTRY) (FOREIGN COUNTRY) 17. Address in the United States where beneficiary will reside (City) (State) 430 Orange Grove S. Padaena, California 91030 18. Address at which beneficiary is presently residing (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (Province or State) (ZIP Code) 199 Suksavitaya T. Silom Bangkok Thailand 19. (a) Beneficiary's address abroad (if any) is: (Number and Street) (Town or City) (Province) (Country) Same as #18 (b) If the beneficiary's native alphabet is other than Roman letters, write his/her name and address in the native alphabet: (Name) (Number and Street) (Town or City) (Province) (Country) Initial relocated Returned Completed Receipt Received Sent 1986 FORM I-130 JUN RANS ST OVER Resulmitted RECEIVED RET'D TRANS. OUT COMPLETED (Rev. 5-5-83) N
